LanguageData.LetterMechlinkInstalled:
{PAWN_labelShort} has installed a RobCo. Controller! {PAWN_pronoun} is now a roboticist and can create and control robots.

Research basic robotech to get started.

(*SectionTitle)Creating robots:(/SectionTitle) Your roboticist can create robots at a production building called a robot factory.

(*SectionTitle)About bandwidth:(/SectionTitle) Roboticists can control as many robots as their total bandwidth allows. Select {PAWN_labelShort} and look at {PAWN_possessive} 'Bandwidth' readout to see how much bandwidth {PAWN_pronoun} is currently using and how much {PAWN_pronoun} has available. Bandwidth can be increased with certain apparel and by building band node buildings.

(*SectionTitle)About control groups:(/SectionTitle) Roboticists control robots in groups. Each control group can be set to one of these modes:

- Work
- Escort
- Recharge
- Dormant self-charge

To learn more about what each mode does, select the work mode icon on one of {PAWN_labelShort}'s control groups and hover over the different work orders. The maximum number of control groups can be increased with apparel and implants.

(*SectionTitle)About threat calling:(/SectionTitle) Roboticists can signal ancient leader robots to attack in order to obtain rare items from them. You must do this to improve your roboticist past certain limits, but beware the danger.
